title: Pomegranate, orange and pistachio parfait
blurb: For a light yet impressive breakfast, treat yourself to a parfait, jewelled with pomegranate and vibrant orange. The mint and pistachio topping adds that all important freshness and crunch.

ingredients.preparation: peeled and thinly sliced into rounds

method: In two small serving glasses, arrange layers of orange slices, pomegranate seeds and yogurt, finishing with a layer of yogurt at the top of the glass.
Scatter with chopped pistachios and mint just before serving.
other: If you're short of time, you can buy packs of pomegranate seeds in large supermarkets; this will save you the effort of removing the juicy seeds of the fruit. However, if you're using a whole pomegranate, simply slice the fruit in half with the seeds facing downwards over a bowl, then whack with a wooden spoon for easy removal.
